vlive.korean: [당황 내가?] - 축의금 안 했어요? - 정말? You didn't? - Really? 듣기 View video Big Picture (빅픽처) : 빅픽처3 EP28_ 가슴을 열어라2 - XX오빠~ 돈 내 놓으세요!!
[깐족] 작가님~ 축의금 냈습니다! I paid congratulatory money at the wedding! 듣기 View video Big Picture (빅픽처) : 빅픽처3 EP28_ 가슴을 열어라2 - XX오빠~ 돈 내 놓으세요!!
vlive.english: I paid congratulatory money at the wedding!

vlive.korean: [용건은 바로 축의금 미납!] 근데 제 결혼식에 축의금 왜 안 내셨어요? Why didn't you give a single penny for my wedding? 듣기 View video Big Picture (빅픽처) : 빅픽처3 EP28_ 가슴을 열어라2 - XX오빠~ 돈 내 놓으세요!!
vlive.english: Why didn't you give a single penny for my wedding?

vlive.korean: [고민, 축의금... 어떻게 하지?] - 왜 너는 그 말을... - 내가... 그런... Why did you... - Why did I... 듣기 View video Big Picture (빅픽처) : 빅픽처3 EP28_ 가슴을 열어라2 - XX오빠~ 돈 내 놓으세요!!
vlive.english: Why did you... - Why did I...

vlive.korean: 그러면... -나도 축의금 많이 낼게요. Then... - I'll give you a lot of congratulatory money. 듣기 View video GAVYNJ : 노래 한 번 할게요....
vlive.english: Then... - I'll give you a lot of congratulatory money.

examples.korean: All firms will be closed in honor of the occasion. 발음듣기 모든 기관은 그날 축의를 표하고 휴업한다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: All firms will be closed in honor of the occasion. 발음

examples.korean: Tom sent his congratulations to her. 발음듣기 톰은 그녀에게 축의를 표했다 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Tom sent his congratulations to her. 발음

examples.korean: I gave fifty thousand won as a gift at his wedding. 발음듣기 그의 결혼식에 축의금으로 5만 원을 냈다 Neungyule
examples.english: I gave fifty thousand won as a gift at his wedding. 발음

examples.korean: I'm going to give a monetary gift for his wedding. 발음듣기 전 그의 결혼식에 축의금을 내려고 해요. Neungyule
examples.english: I'm going to give a monetary gift for his wedding. 발음

examples.korean: It's one of the pillars of good health, says Dr. Jane Serby, director of research at the NSC. 발음듣기 그것은 건강을 지탱해 주는 큰 축의 하나입니다. 라고 NSC의 연구 소장인 제인 서비 박사는 말한다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It's one of the pillars of good health, says Dr. Jane Serby, director of research at the NSC. 발음
